Pre-Game Insights: Pete Crow-Armstrong's mindset was influenced by a conversation with manager Craig Counsell in spring training, where Counsell asked Crow-Armstrong to trust in him to make the next play.
Post-Match Reflections: The Cubs dropped the series against the Rockies, and rookie Pete Crow-Armstrong saw the big-picture relevance of the team's situation.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cubs avoided a sweep with a win on Sunday, but the damage had already been done from the series loss to the Rockies.
